dcterms:creator: D. Gray
S. Brennan
H. Tao
dcterms:description: A dataset captured from two hand-carried cameras in an outdoor academic environment, containing 632 pedestrian pairs with images from different camera views, used for person re-identification.
dcterms:title: VIPeR Dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Li
R. Zhao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset captured with two camera views in a campus environment, containing 971 persons with two images each from different camera views, used for person re-identification.
dcterms:title: CUHK01 Dataset
